channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Shooting kills 2 and wounds 6 during Halloween celebrations in Orlando
item.description: Police in Florida say two people have been killed and six others have been wounded during a Halloween celebration in Orlando.

item.title: Inside a 1760 schoolhouse for Black children is a complicated history of slavery and resilience
item.description: A museum in Virginia has nearly finished restoring the nation’s oldest surviving schoolhouse for Black children.

item.title: Trump says Liz Cheney might not be such a ‘war hawk’ if she had guns pointed at her
item.description: Former President Donald Trump has launched another attack on former Rep. Liz Cheney, calling the Republican former Wyoming congresswoman a “war hawk” and suggesting she might not be as willing to send troops to fight if she had guns pointed at her.
